c74object.name: fluid.buf2list
c74object.digest: Copy the contents of a buffer~ to a list
c74object.description: A simplified workflow for extracting numerical data from buffers as lists of numbers.
c74object.discussion:
Open the Overview Patch Given a source buffer that is valid, fluid.buf2list copies its contents to a new list when it receives a bang.
This is a convenient way of extracting data from a buffer to be used elsewhere.
fluid.buf2list is part of the Fluid Decomposition Toolkit of the FluCoMa project. For more explanations, learning material, and discussions on its musicianly uses, visit flucoma.org.

objarg.name: maxsize
objarg.description: Sets a maximum size for the internal list. The absolute maximum in Max is 32767.

method.name: bang
method.description: Extract data from the source buffer~, given the current values of startframe, numframes, startchan and numchans.

method.name: buffer
method.digest: Set the source buffer~ and trigger processing
method.description: Sets the value of source Then processes as if bang had been called.

attribute.name: autosize
attribute.digest: Determines if the output buffer will be resized according to the size of the input list.

attribute.name: axis
attribute.digest: Changes the orientation of the data that is copied. axis 0 copies frame-wise into a single channel. axis 1 will copy the list channel-wise resulting in as many channels as there are elements in the input list.

attribute.name: destination
attribute.digest: The buffer~ to copy the list values to.

attribute.name: startchan
attribute.digest: For multichannel output buffers, which which channel to begin copying to. The default is 0.

attribute.name: startframe
attribute.digest: The starting index (in samples) from which to copy in the source buffer.
